author: Rachel Premack
title: 'Is this America anymore?': Peeved Michiganders are slamming their governor after a statewide travel crackdown means they cannot go to their cottage up north
description: Michigan Gov. Gretchen Whitmer announced a stay-at-home order on Thursday that means residents will not be able to travel between residences. It's a shock to many Michiganders, where owning a cottage in Northern Michigan is typical even among middle-class res…
content:
Michigan Gov. Gretchen Whitmer, who is leading one of the states hit hardest by the coronavirus pandemic, has extended the state's stay-at-home order until May 1. 
The order also included some measures not seen in other states, like how big-box stores can't … [+3765 chars]
